```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}

```

```{r ggally_facetbar, cache = TRUE}

data(tips, package = "reshape")
 ggally_facetbar(tips, ggplot2::aes(x = sex, y = smoker, fill = time))
 ggally_facetbar(tips, ggplot2::aes(x = smoker, y = sex, fill = time))
```
